data.headline: Junior Backend Engineer
data.summary: Experienced in various backend technologies, I am a fast learner and passionate about building robust and scalable applications. With a strong foundation in computer science principles, I am eager to apply my skills to solve complex problems and contribute to the success of the team.

experience.title: Junior Backend Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained backend services using Python and Django, ensuring high performance and reliability.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to support the company's web and mobile applications.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to understand requirements and deliver solutions that met business needs.
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and maintainability.
Participated in code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions to continuously improve development practices.

experience.title: Intern, Backend Development
bullets: Gained hands-on experience in building and deploying backend services using Python and Django.
Participated in the development of a microservices-based architecture, contributing to the design and implementation of APIs.
Learned best practices for version control, continuous integration, and deployment using Git and Docker.
Attended weekly team meetings and technical workshops to expand my knowledge and skills.

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: Developed a personal blog using Django, PostgreSQL, and Nginx. Implemented features such as user authentication, content management, and responsive design.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Sylvie is a young woman with short brown hair, wearing a blue collared shirt and smiling at the camera.
